text: package includes series functions provides recipes create re-usable charts line Divisible Content Strategy. functions rendered predefined Report template, aka “Statistical Factsheet” got Countries Regions, generated either PDF Powerpoint presentations. Designers, convenient versions plot svg format (usable Illustrator/Inkscape Indesign/Scribus) can generated directly : unhcrthemes::unhcr_save(plot, "plot.svg"). can also explore Country Statistical Focus, accessible provides visualization country relation 6 dimensions displacement: Categories, Origin, Demographics, Solutions, Processing Source.

title:
UNHCR Population Statistics Database with Chart Library and
    Factsheet Template
text: data presented website consists following dataset: End-year population figures - stock figures specific types populations end year, including refugees, IDPs asylum seekers. Demographics – available UNHCR data, IDMC UNRWA data. demographics available resettlement naturalization data Asylum applications asylum-seekers Asylum decisions taken asylum claims asylum-seekers Solutions – flow figures, total number individuals availed solution year.

title:
UNHCR Population Statistics Database with Chart Library and
    Factsheet Template
text: Details provided dataset data disaggregated year, since 1951 stock figures, type population, country/territory asylum origin. Note term country/territory asylum range contexts depending dataset chosen Resettlement – context country arrival – .e. country refugee resettled Returns – context country departure – .e. country refugee voluntarily repatriated. Country/territory asylum origin – full list UN countries available UNSD methodology page . ISO3 country codes included. UNHCR uses following non-standard ISO3 country codes: UNK Various/unknown STA Stateless

what: Data protection & Statistical Disclosure Risk Treatment
title:
UNHCR Population Statistics Database with Chart Library and
    Factsheet Template
text: publishing statistics refugee statistics website, UNHCR applies safeguards protect confidentiality. Small numbers less five rounded nearest multiple five. Additionally data relating pending asylum applications, new applications decisions rounded five ten. Data tables remains additive therefore totals considered approximations.
